commentSummary.summary: Users love these cookies for their perfect texture and rich flavor. The recipe consistently produces excellent results.
pros: Perfect texture - crispy outside, chewy inside
cons: Takes time to chill the dough
Can be too sweet for some
tips: Chill the dough for at least 1 hour
Add a pinch of sea salt on top before baking
Let cookies cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes
